profilePage.title: Welcome to MenteViva
profilePage.subtitle: This is your guide to starting your journey toward emotional well-being.

about.title: What is MenteViva?
about.description: MenteViva is your personal AI companion, designed to offer you emotional support and tools to strengthen your mental health. We are not a replacement for professional therapy, but a complement in your pocket, available 24/7 to listen, guide, and help you find calm.

support.title: Support our Mission
support.description: MenteViva is and always will be free. If you find value in this tool, please consider supporting our work with a small contribution. It helps us keep the app ad-free and accessible to everyone.

moodTracker.title: AI Mood Tracking
moodTracker.description: This is your tool for self-awareness. Log your daily emotions and thoughts, and our AI companion will offer an empathetic and therapeutic response. It helps you identify patterns and feel heard.

emotionalGarden.title: Emotional Garden
emotionalGarden.description: This is your personal sanctuary where you can visualize your emotional journey. Every mood you log blossoms into a flower for good days, a plant for calm days, or rain for challenging days, reminding you that all experiences contribute to your growth.

resilienceSanctuary.title: Resilience Sanctuary
resilienceSanctuary.description: This is your personal library of strength. Save the thoughts and reflections that resonate with you. Revisit them in difficult times to remember your own ability to overcome. It is a powerful reminder of your journey and growth.

emotionalTraining.title: Emotional Training
emotionalTraining.description: Strengthen your mind. Based on your emotional profiles and goals, the AI generates personalized training modules. You will learn practical strategies to manage anxiety, impulsivity, and improve your emotional regulation.

safeSpace.title: Inspiration Spaces
safeSpace.description: Your personal sanctuary for calm. Find messages of meditation, relaxing music, and positive affirmations. It's the perfect place to find peace in moments of stress.

crisisMode.title: Calm Button
crisisMode.description: If you are feeling overwhelmed, this is your emergency button. It provides grounding and breathing techniques to help you regain calm immediately. You are not alone; we are here to help you through the moment.

crisisModal.title: Stay Calm. You Are Safe.
crisisModal.description: Focus on your breath. Let's get grounded together.

anchoringSteps.5: Acknowledge FIVE things you see around you.
anchoringSteps.4: Acknowledge FOUR things you can touch.
anchoringSteps.3: Acknowledge THREE things you can hear.
anchoringSteps.2: Acknowledge TWO things you can smell.
anchoringSteps.1: Acknowledge ONE thing you can taste.

crisisModal.breathingDescription: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds. Repeat.

emergency.title: Emergency Contact
emergency.description: If you are in danger or need immediate medical help, do not hesitate to contact your local emergency services.
emergency.footer: These buttons will use the standard emergency number (911). If your country uses a different number, please dial it manually.

emotionalGarden.title: Your Emotional Garden
emotionalGarden.subtitle: A reflection of your inner journey. Every day, a new leaf, a new flower.

forBusinessPage.title: MenteViva for Your Team
forBusinessPage.subtitle: Invest in your company's most important asset: your employees' well-being. Discover how our tool can transform your work culture.

features.title: A happier, more productive workforce
features.description: Provide your team with the tools they need to manage stress, improve focus, and build emotional resilience, all in a confidential and supportive environment.

one.title: Reduce Stress and Burnout
one.description: Offer employees a safe space to process emotions and access relaxation techniques, decreasing stress levels across the organization.

two.title: Increase Productivity and Focus
two.description: A mentally healthier team is a more focused and motivated team. MenteViva helps reduce distractions caused by anxiety.

three.title: Foster a Positive Culture
three.description: Show a genuine commitment to your employees' health, improving morale, loyalty, and attracting top talent.

four.title: Fully Confidential
four.description: We guarantee user privacy. Individual data is never shared. Only anonymized, aggregated reports are provided to measure impact.

finalCta.title: Ready to transform your workplace?
finalCta.description: Contact us today for a personalized demo and find out how MenteViva can be tailored to your organization's needs.
